about.title: Objective & Career Goals
about.content: To excel as a professional, in the elds of Accountancy and financial management while delivering best service possible in achieving organizational objectives.

subSections.title: KPMG Sri Lanka
subSections.subTitle: Associate One
subSections.content:
I was primarily responsible for performing the statutory financial audits in accordance with SLFRS & LKAS. Also evaluated internal control systems of clients and provide recommendations for critical parameters.

At the book keeping, planned and evaluated all accounting procedures including payables, receivables monthly reconciliations, analysis of the general ledger accounts.
